meanings.definition: Furthest back in position or order.
meanings.sent1: The rearmost seat on the bus is usually the least crowded.
meanings.sent2: The rearmost car in the train is the farthest from the engine.
meanings.sent3: The rearmost cookie in the jar always seems to disappear first.
meanings.sent4: Her rearmost thoughts were filled with nostalgia for the past.
meanings.sent5: The rearmost star in the constellation shone the brightest.

meanings.definition: Located at the end or back.
meanings.sent1: The rearmost door of the building leads to the alley.
meanings.sent2: The rearmost page of the book contained the conclusion.
meanings.sent3: The rearmost slice of pizza is always the cheesiest.
meanings.sent4: His rearmost position in the race didn't reflect his true speed.
meanings.sent5: The rearmost tree in the forest stood tall and proud.
